## blockRendering.Renderer class

The base class for a block renderer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Renderer implements IRegistrable 
```
**Implements:** [IRegistrable](./blockly.iregistrable.md)

|  [overrides](./blockly.blockrendering.renderer.overrides.md) | <code>protected</code> | object \| null | Rendering constant overrides, passed in through options. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.blockrendering.renderer.dispose.md) |  | Dispose of this renderer. Delete all DOM elements that this renderer and its constants created. |
|  [getClassName()](./blockly.blockrendering.renderer.getclassname.md) |  | Gets the class name that identifies this renderer. |
|  [getConstants()](./blockly.blockrendering.renderer.getconstants.md) |  | Get the current renderer's constant provider. We assume that when this is called, the renderer has already been initialized. |
|  [init(theme, opt\_rendererOverrides)](./blockly.blockrendering.renderer.init.md) |  | Initialize the renderer. |
|  [makeConstants\_()](./blockly.blockrendering.renderer.makeconstants_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Create a new instance of the renderer's constant provider. |
|  [makeDrawer\_(block, info)](./blockly.blockrendering.renderer.makedrawer_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Create a new instance of the renderer's drawer. |
|  [makePathObject(root, style)](./blockly.blockrendering.renderer.makepathobject.md) |  | Create a new instance of a renderer path object. |
|  [makeRenderInfo\_(block)](./blockly.blockrendering.renderer.makerenderinfo_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Create a new instance of the renderer's render info object. |
|  [orphanCanConnectAtEnd(topBlock, orphanBlock, localType)](./blockly.blockrendering.renderer.orphancanconnectatend.md) | <code>protected</code> | Checks if an orphaned block can connect to the "end" of the topBlock's block-clump. If the clump is a row the end is the last input. If the clump is a stack, the end is the last next connection. If the clump is neither, then this returns false. |
|  [refreshDom(svg, theme, injectionDivIfIsParent)](./blockly.blockrendering.renderer.refreshdom.md) |  | Refresh the renderer after a theme change. |
|  [shouldHighlightConnection(\_conn)](./blockly.blockrendering.renderer.shouldhighlightconnection.md) |  | Determine whether or not to highlight a connection. |
